translations: adj.非易失性的；非挥发性的

sentences.sentence: It would take a major explosion to scatter nonvolatile elements beyond the immediate area.
sentences.translation: 只有在发生大爆炸的情况下，不易挥发元素才会散落到周边地区以外更远的地方。

sentences.sentence: In this case, using a fast device, such as one with fast write nonvolatile cache, will optimize performance.
sentences.translation: 在这种情况下，高速设备(例如带有高速写非易失高速缓存的设备)的使用将优化性能。

sentences.sentence: The race has been on to build nonvolatile high-speed memories that will allow computers to be turned on and off like televisions.
sentences.translation: 制造一种能使计算机像电视机那样能随时开关的非易失性高速储存器的竞争一直在进行。
